data.name: label
data.description: Defines the label text or a snippet for the toggle.

data.name: type
data.description: Specifies whether the toggle functions as a checkbox or a radio button.

data.name: name
data.description: Sets the name attribute, useful for grouping toggles in forms.

data.name: id
data.description: Unique identifier for the toggle. If not provided, a random ID is generated.

data.name: value
data.description: Controls the toggle's state. Can be true, false, or a string value.

data.name: size
data.description: Defines the size of the toggle.

data.name: animate
data.description: Controls the animation speed when toggling.

data.name: rounded
data.description: Defines the border-radius of the toggle switch.

data.name: wrapperClasses
data.description: Custom CSS classes applied to the wrapper div.

data.name: labelClasses
data.description: Custom CSS classes for styling the label. Inherits from the Form component if available.
